org.apache.flink.runtime.operators.shipping

类 OutputCollector<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.operators.shipping.OutputCollector<T>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Collector<T>

    public class OutputCollector<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Collector<T>
    The OutputCollector collects records, and emits them to the RecordWriters. The OutputCollector tracks to which writers a deep-copy must be given and which not.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private SerializationDelegate<T> delegate 
      private RecordWriter<SerializationDelegate<T>>[] writers 

    • 构造器概要

      Initializes the output collector with a set of writers.

    • 方法概要

    • 构造器详细资料

      • OutputCollector

        public OutputCollector(java.util.List<RecordWriter<SerializationDelegate<T>>> writers,
                       TypeSerializer<T> serializer)
        Initializes the output collector with a set of writers. To specify for a writer that it must be fed with a deep-copy, set the bit in the copy flag bit mask to 1 that corresponds to the position of the writer within the List.
        参数:
        writers - List of all writers.

    • 方法详细资料

      • collect

        public void collect(T record)
        Collects a record and emits it to all writers.
        指定者:
        collect 在接口中 Collector<T>
        参数:
        record - The record to collect.

      • close

        public void close()
        从接口复制的说明: Collector
        Closes the collector. If any data was buffered, that data will be flushed.
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 Collector<T>

      • getWriters

        public java.util.List<RecordWriter<SerializationDelegate<T>>> getWriters()
        List of writers that are associated with this output collector
        返回:
        list of writers
